sect1.title: Flag reference
sect1.para: This section is a quick-reference for GHC's command-line flags. For each flag, we also list its static/dynamic status (see ), and the flag's opposite (if available).

row.entry: output full span in error messages

Generate dependency information suitable for use in a Makefile; see for details.
